p: The present study demonstrated that P. granatum fruits peel extract attenuated enzyme inhibition in DM, obesity, and hypertension. In addition, FT-IR and GC-MS analyses of ethanolic extract of fruits peel revealed the occurrence of diverse bioactive compounds. Further extensive studies are required to get a deeper insight of not only on in silico molecular docking mechanisms of the bioactive substances in the metabolic pathway of obesity and hypertension in DM but also pivotal therapeutic role of P. granatum fruits peel through in vivo studies.
